item.title: About

item.description:
Education:

Work Experience:

My name is Daniel CÃ ceres a seasoned Data Architect with 12+ years of experience architecting scalable, cloud-native data solutions. Expert in designing real-time data pipelines, implementing data governance frameworks, and leveraging AI/ML for predictive analytics. Spearheaded a data modernization initiative that reduced data processing time by 80% and increased data accuracy by 25%. Adept at leading cross-functional teams to deliver innovative, business-driven data strategies.
